Battery.Description: Lithium-ion batteries are commonly used in various applications due to their high energy density and long cycle life.
Batteries are a crucial component in electric vehicles, providing the necessary power for propulsion.
Batteries are used to store excess energy generated from renewable sources like solar and wind, allowing for a more reliable and sustainable energy supply.
Battery management systems are essential for monitoring and controlling the performance, safety, and lifespan of batteries.
